All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Animation
This class is responsible for handling animations.
Animator
This class is responsible for handling animation states.
BaseContext
This is the default context that is used when no other context is available.
Context
The Context class is the base class for all contexts.
Debug
This class provides a simple logging system for the framework.
Debug.LogFormatter
This is the inner class that defined the log formatter.
Engine
This is the main class of the framework.
FontAtlas
This class is used to create a font atlas for a given font.
Input
This class is used to handle all the input events.
KeyCode
This class is used to store the key codes used by the Input class.
Renderer
This class is used to render graphics on the target buffer.
Sprite
This class is responsible for handling sprites.
SpriteSheet
A class that represents a Sprite sheet.
Time
This class is used to handle the Timing of the framework.
Window
This class is used to create a window and render to it.
